definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
a thousand pounds hangs by a thread (idiom)/imminent peril/a matter of life or death

sentences.english: These two trends will push the world economy into the knowledge-based third stage with great momentum.
sentences.chinese: 鈞之勢推動世界經濟進入知識經濟的第三階段。

sentences.english: All of the junk was taken from the sea.
sentences.chinese: 這些垃圾鈞是取自於大海。

sentences.english: Jun, the An wants to emulate dugout to walk one troops of encounter, looking.
sentences.chinese: 鈞座，俺想順着戰壕走一遭，看看部隊。

sentences.english: JuntaiYuzhou in Henan Province is located in the north door.
sentences.chinese: 鈞臺位於河南省禹州市北門裏。

sentences.english: Mr. Ma did say, however, that Apple had agreed to discuss the latest report.
sentences.chinese: 然而馬鈞也說蘋果同意就最新的報告開展討論。

definition: surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
to respect/to admire/to venerate/by the emperor himself
